comp3111.webscraper

Class SearchRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp3111.webscraper.SearchRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SearchRecord
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    SearchRecord stores a search that contains the keyword used for the search and the results of the search. It also provides a save and load function to read and write history from and into files.
    Author:
    Daniel Cheung, Tse Ho Nam
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:
        record - The record the refine search is based on
        keyword - The refine keyword
